short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scribo for Google Docs extension for Chrome - Taiwan

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get ready for the Advanced Subjects Test (AST) with Scribo, the must-have tool for students determined to elevate their English writing skills. Trusted by some of the most rigorous educational systems worldwide, Scribo’s intuitive AI helps you practice and perfect your writing, giving you the edge you need to excel in the English composition section, which accounts for 20% of your AST score.

Scribo provides you with personalized feedback on your writing and gives you an indicative score based on the same rubrics used in the exam, helping you see how your work measures up against the standard. Instantly identify areas of strength and weakness—whether it's grammar, structure, or argumentation—and receive tailored suggestions to improve your essays.

With Scribo, you can track your progress over time and watch your score grow by focusing on specific writing goals, and fine-tuning your skills to confidently face the exam. Join the community of students using Scribo to make AST preparation smarter and more effective, one essay at a time.
